title:Houdini's God Rolls
description:Houdini's wishlist for the Noble Sacrifice clan and friends

//{ Exalted Truth (Adept)
//notes:Houdini (PvP): Rangefinder+Eye of the Storm is the God Roll. 68 stability is my goal on 140 hand cannons and then dump the rest into range without hurting handling. Other perks to keep an eye on: Perfect Float instead of Rangefinder, Repulsor Brace for Gyrfalcon Hunters, Rangefinder with Kill Clip/Rampage/Frenzy are also good combos|tags:god-pvp

//notes:Houdini (PvE): Not a weapon I would use in PvE, but if I'm keeping a PvE roll it is Rangefinder + Frenzy (which happens to be a decent PvP roll on its own). Optimize for reload and magazine size in the minor perks|tags:pve

// Allied Demand
//notes:Houdini (PvE): A sidearm needs an insane perk pool for me to keep a PvE roll for one and Allied Demand does not have an insane perk pool. Best option is Rangefinder + Frenzy (which happens to be a decent PvP roll on its own anyway). Optimize for reload and magazine size in minor perks. |tags:pve

// Forgiveness
// Smallbore,Polygonal Rifling,Corkscrew Rifling,Hammer-forged Rifling,Fluted Barrel
// Flared Magwell,Light Mag,Armor-Piercing Rounds,Appended Mag,Alloy Magazine,Ricochet Rounds,High-Caliber Rounds
// Demolitionist
// Adrenaline Junkie,Multikill Clip
//notes:Houdini (PvE): Sidearms aren't very viable in PvE, but Demolionist + Adrenaline Junkie is an interesting roll on any weapon. Optimize for reload and magazine size in the minor perks. |tags:pve

//notes:Houdini (trash): Anything with Well-Rounded or Fragile Focus is garbage|tags:trash

dimwishlist:item=-2405619467&perks=2451262963

//{ Whistler's Whim
// Polymer String,Flexible String,Elastic String
// Fiberglass Arrow Shaft,Straight Fletching,Helical Fletching,Compact Arrow Shaft
// Rangefinder,Moving Target
// Opening Shot,Kill Clip,Swashbuckler,Adrenaline Junkie
// Veist Stinger (3988215619)
//notes:Houdini (PvP): Rangefinder + Opening Shot with Polymer String, Fiberglass Arrow Shaft, and a Draw Time masterwork is the God roll. Moving Target + Opening Shot is temping, but the base aim assist is 74, so with a targeting mod and Opening Shot, it already has max aim assist. Any good roll must have a 50ms Draw time achieved by either Elastic String or a Draw Time masterwork with Flexible String or Polymer String. Focus on accuracy after Draw Time. Other perks to keep an eye on: Kill Clip, Adrenaline Junkie, Swashbuckler |tags:pvp

// Whistler's Whim
// Polymer String,Flexible String,Elastic String
// Fiberglass Arrow Shaft,Straight Fletching,Helical Fletching,Compact Arrow Shaft
// Rangefinder,Rapid Hit
// Kill Clip,Adrenaline Junkie,Swashbuckler
// Veist Stringer
//notes:Houdini (PvE): Rangefinder + Kill Clip with Polymer String, Fiberglass Arrow Shaft, and a Draw Time masterwork is the God roll. Archer's Tempo is in the wrong column to be useful. Any good roll must have a 50ms Draw time achieved by either Elastic String or a Draw Time masterwork with Flexible String or Polymer String. Focus on accuracy after Draw Time. Other perks to keep an eye on: Rapid Hit, Adrenaline Junkie, Swashbuckler |tags:pve

// This Block is needed because we don't want the next trash block to reject a bow with otherwise acceptable perks, but one bad first column perk.
//notes:Houdini: Bows are only viable with optimal (500ms) Draw Time. A 500ms Draw Time is achieved by either Elastic String or a Draw Time masterwork with Flexible String or Polymer String

//{ The Inquisitor
// Fluted Barrel,Arrowhead Brake,Corkscrew Rifling,
// Assault Mag,Extended Mag,Steady Rounds,
// Perpetual Motion
// Opening Shot
//notes:Houdini (PvP): Opening Shot is the must have perk on The Inquisitor. In the third column I'm going for Perpetual Motion for the handling bump, but that isn't critical. The Inquisitor has several damage perks in the 4th column, but slug shotguns already one-shot to the head. If you have opening shot, then you don't need any additional investment in range, so focus on handling. Extended Mag and Steady Rounds are decent options to boost the in-air effectiveness. |tags:pvp

// The Inquisitor
//notes:Houdini (PvE): Slug shotguns are used for DPS which makes Fourth Time's the Charm a mandatory perk. For the damage perk, I'd probably pick Golden Tricorn because it has the longest effect duration, but it depends on which perk is easiest to activate in a specific encounter. For the minor perks prioritize magazine size and range without compromising reload speed. Other perks to keep an eye on: Demolitionist is potentially viable to get the free reload|tags:pve

// Frenzy,Explosive Payload

//{ Eyasluna

In the third column, I like Rangefinder to help with longer range engagements, but there are several viable options. All scope or magazine options are viable. Other perks to keep an eye on: Perpetual Motion, Rapid Hit|tags:pve

//{ Heritage
// Fluted Barrel
// Assault Mag
// Slideshot,Threat Detector
// Moving Target
//notes:Houdini (PvP): As a general purpose PvP shotgun: Fluted Barrel, Assault Mag, Slideshot, Moving Target with a Handling Masterwork. If you never slide, go Threat Detector instead. |tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,3161816588,588594999
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,4071163871,588594999

// Fluted Barrel
// Assault Mag
// Hip-Fire Grip
// Offhand Strike
//notes:Houdini (PvP): An alternative PvP roll for Heritage is a hip fire focused weapon with: Fluted Barrel, Assault Mag, Hip-Fire Grip, Offhand Strike, and a Handling Masterwork|tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,791862061,1866048759,3050799639

// Fluted Barrel
// Tactical Mag
// Reconstruction
// Recombination,Focused Fury
//notes:Houdini (PvE): Heritage is the best slug shotgun in the game. Go with Fluted Barrel, Tactical Mag, Reconstruction and Recombination with a Handling Masterwork. For a DPS specific option, go with Focused Fury instead of Recombination. |tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,106909392,1523832109,469285294
dimwishlist:item=4248569242&perks=1840239774,106909392,1523832109,2896038713
//}

//{ Gunnora's Axe 
// Fluted Barrel,Hammer-Forged Rifling
// Accurized Rounds
// Moving Target,Threat Detector
// Opening Shot
//notes:Houdini (PvP): Moving Target + Opening Shot is the best roll for PvP. With Opening Shot, try to hit 75 base range and dump the rest of the minor stats in handling. Opening Shot is the gold standard for shotguns, so I wouldn't keep anything else in the 4th column. Threat Detector is a reasonable backup option in the 3rd column. |tags:pvp
